column4: hi guys i cannot boot 10.10 CD on my new laptop. It just drop me to GRUB.
is there any CD that i can boot my Sandy Bridge Laptop?
maybe the 11.04 ones
!11.04 | kimyong
ack
bummer
but it doesn't make sense. I can install it with a Debian CD but not Ubuntu?
well maybe 10.10 or 10.04 installs with failsafe graphics ( vesa )
erUSUL it wont even go as far as that. It just drop me to Grub shell
then something else is going on... does it show any error message?
nope
boots fine one fedora and deb. i think it has to do with grub 1.9xxx
well with that info is hard to know what is happening
that's why i am here.
I'll try booth via thumbdrive
if it just drops to grub without any error message like " giving up  waiting for root device  " or root device foo not found or something like that ...
npoe nothing at all
even that i can't find the kernel either
really weird. usually there is a reason no matter how cryptic
that's what you get for a spanking new laptop
so right now it is running in debian squeeze :|
unfortunetly bleeding edge hardware still has issues with linux ...
hey i was a steal. 1K USD for an i7-2630QM with 8 GB of RAM
enjoy the shiny new toy ;)
